reporting-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

title.narrative: Support to livelihoods, food security and nutrition of IDPs and vulnerable people in Libia

description.narrative: Il Progetto intende migliorare le condizioni di vita delle fasce più deboli della popolazione libica, attraverso la distribuzione di aiuti alimentari per gli sfollati, per i nuclei familiari con capofamiglia donne e quelli senza reddito.

The project aims at saving lives and protect livelihoods in emergencies. The WFP is responding to the urgent food and nutrition needs of IDPs in Libya and vulnerable people and reducing under-nutrition to below emergencies levels.

participating-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development
AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

organisation.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

tag.narrative: By 2030, end all forms of malnutrition, including achieving, by 2025, the internationally agreed targets on stunting and wasting in children under 5 years of age, and address the nutritional needs of adolescent girls, pregnant and lactating women and older persons
By 2030, end hunger and ensure access by all people, in particular the poor and people in vulnerable situations, including infants, to safe, nutritious and sufficient food all year round
End hunger, achieve food security and improved nutrition and promote sustainable agriculture
